services.servicesDescription: Whether you need to protect your operations, streamline payments, or verify documents, we have the solution that fits you.

adamoId.title: Verify your customers' identity with AdamoID
adamoId.description: With ADAMO ID, validate your users' identity through biometrics, document analysis, and multichannel authentication. Secure critical processes and prevent fraud from the first interaction.

adamoPay.title: Optimize your payment management with AdamoPay
adamoPay.description: With ADAMO PAY, convert currencies and distribute local or cross-border payments in real time, with built-in traceability and compliance.

adamoRisk.title: Mitigate risks in your business with AdamoRisk
adamoRisk.description: With ADAMO RISK, detect risks, guide your decisions, and stay protected in real time so you can operate confidently, every day.

adamoSign.title: Automate documents with AdamoSign
adamoSign.description: With ADAMOSIGN, forget about paperwork, slow processes, and risks. Sign from anywhere, in seconds, with full legal support.

hero.description: Optimize your payments with a platform that combines speed, efficient costs, and strict compliance with local regulations.

pageParallax.title: Control, analysis, and reports
pageParallax.description: Avoid fraud and errors with detailed reports and intelligent alerts. Monitor risks, correct data, and easily take control of each operation.

exchangeBanner.introDescription: With Adamo Pay, perform transactions complying with international regulations, reducing risks and ensuring transparency in each movement.
exchangeBanner.title: Exchange currencies at the best rate and without delays.

paymentList.title: Process large payment batches
paymentList.description: Upload your file, review payments with updates, and decide whether to disperse or archive them. Adamo Pay gives you the power to manage each transaction, avoiding errors and keeping your payments organized.

paymentForm.title: Beneficiary management and individual payments
paymentForm.description: Search among your saved contacts or enter the information manually. Complete the bank and fiscal data easily and save the beneficiary for future transactions.

hero.title: Adamo ID
hero.description: Use advanced biometric technology. Reduce risks and streamline authentication processes in real-time.

banner.introTitle: Verify your customers' identity with AdamoID
banner.introDescription: With AdamoID, authenticate users quickly, complying with the most stringent regulations and reducing the risk of fraud, without sacrificing the customer experience.
banner.title: Protect your business with biometric and document validation in seconds.

idFlow.title: Create identity verification flows to your measure
idFlow.description: Select the types of verification that best adapt to your process and generate a personalized flow. Send the verifications through the channel you prefer —to a person or to several customers at the same time— and accelerate your identity control in a secure and efficient way.
idFlow.button: Learn more about identity verification flows

pageParallax.title: Total Verification Control
pageParallax.description: Easily monitor and manage the status of each verification. View successful, failed, or pending results and make quick decisions to maintain safe and efficient operations.

idPanel.title: All the information you need, at a glance.
idPanel.description: Access the detailed status of each verification — identity, facial, address, phone, email, and IP — and quickly detect any issues that require review. Simplify the validation process and ensure faster, more secure decisions.
